divs: Sighting DetailsFlew downwards at about 30 degrees then stopped COMPLETLY about 100 feet above ground and about 200 yards from my viewpoint - then changed directions by approx 90 degrees. This was completly opposite of my viewpoint. Objest began flashing lights irregulary. The strength and color of this flashing was very simular to a small aircraft but the timing was extremely irregular and not like any aircraft. I continued to observe object for approximatly 2 minutes. Object appeared to have an extreem angle of excape as I was able to observe the irregular flashing light until it dimmed and then extinguished.
Summary: flew downwards then stopped and changed directions by approx 90 degrees.
trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There was one other sighting in Albuquerque on or around August 12th 2008
